title: Lake Roosevelt National Recreation Area: Avian Mystery Kit
body: Avian Mystery Kit       4th-8th Grades  Program Requirements:  There are 27puzzle pieces. A 10 foot wide and a minimum of 5 foot tall wall area where a sheet of felt fabric can be anchored to the wall.  Program Overview: As your students build a life size jigsaw puzzle they learn from each other about this mystery bird-the Bald Eagle. Once the puzzle is completed they will know which bird they have been describing Shhhh! Don't tell them what the program is about! The less they know the more fun it is!  Contact our education specialist for more information or to reserve this trunk.
